summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to additional regular property taxes for Seattle Center, community center, and other neighborhood center improvements; providing for the submission to the qualified electors of the City at the general election on November 2, 1999, of a proposition authorizing the City to levy regular property taxes for up to eight (8) years in excess of the limitation on levies in RCW 84.55.010 for the purposes of making improvements to the Seattle Center Opera House, replacing the Seattle Center Flag Pavilion with a new Festivals Pavilion and open space, building and remodeling community centers, developing neighborhood civic centers, and funding neighborhood gathering places; providing for interim financing pending tax receipts; and creating a new fund.
